summary: Massive Attack is an English music group from Bristol, formed in 1988. The original members were Robert "3D" Del Naja, Grant "Daddy G" Marshall, Adrian "Tricky" Thaws, and Andrew "Mushroom" Vowles. They are known for their trip hop style and have released many successful albums, such as "Blue Lines" and "Mezzanine." The band has won several awards and their music has been featured in TV shows like "House." They also support various social and environmental causes.
title: Massive Attack
